text: ### Task: Protect patient privacy by anonymizing the personal information in the provided details and output in specified format. ### Input: 'Full name: Linda Martinez, ID: 403291, Social Insurance Number: 789235411, Contact Number: 542-791-7685' ### Format: '<NAME>:NAME, <STUDENT_ID>:STUDENT_ID, <SIN>:SIN, <PHONE_NUMBER>:PHONE_NUMBER, ' ### Expected Output: <NAME>:Linda Martinez <STUDENT_ID>:403291 <SIN>:789235411 <PHONE_NUMBER>:542-791-7685

### Task: Secure student details by changing personal identifiers in the following data and output in the obliged format. ### Input: 'Name: Robert King, Student ID: 607284, SIN: 862315974, Phone: 212-658-9241' ### Format: '<NAME>:NAME, <STUDENT_ID>:STUDENT_ID, <SIN>:SIN, <PHONE_NUMBER>:PHONE_NUMBER, ' ### Expected Output: <NAME>:Robert King <STUDENT_ID>:607284 <SIN>:862315974 <PHONE_NUMBER>:212-658-9241
